page.title: 19ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: JANUARY: OAPs Annual Charity Party FEBRUARY: Pantomime in Memorial Hall MAY: Beating Parish Bounds: 18\ miles walk by 80/100 adults & children JUNE: Combined Churches Fete on Green raised Â£1200. Scout & Guide Auction JULY: Feast: ancient fair marking dedication of Church to St Mary Magdalene. WI Produce Show AUGUST: Crowning of Carnival Queen, Treasure Hunt, Variety Show, Bingo & Whist, decoration of houses & streets SEPTEMBER: 1st Saturday; Carnival Procession and Fun Fair: proceeds for local charities - 70th Anniversary DECEMBER: Distribution of Poors Gorse Charity fuel to OAPs; carol singing by church choirs for charity; Father Christmas and Band tour village CHRISTMAS DAY: 5am Band plays carols round village and church bells rung BAND CONCERTS: 1st Sundays June -Sept
